entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
